org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.page

Class PageSyncManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.page.PageSyncManager

  • public class PageSyncManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager for synchronisation of page content between server and client.
    Author:
    clc

      • getUrl

        public java.lang.String getUrl()

      • addContentObject

        public void addContentObject(ContentObjectC object)
        Adds the given content object (that has been created on client side) to the page layout on the server. Returns the same object enriched with new ID and attributes.
        If the server returns null as object, the object could not be added to the page layout on server side and will be removed from the client page layout.

      • syncObjectOutline

        public void syncObjectOutline(ContentObjectC object)
        Sends an updated object polygon to the server.
        Parameters:
        object - Page object with polygon.

      • deleteContentObject

        public void deleteContentObject(ContentObjectC object)
        Sends a request to delete a page object on the server.
        Parameters:
        object -

      • save

        public void save()
        Sends a request to save the current PAGE file permanently.

      • revertChanges

        public void revertChanges()
        Sends a request to discard all changes since the initial load or the last save.
